content: quote: Originally posted by Bergy46: "Politically Correct" is a big bunch of crap dreamed up by the dems and libs. You confuse rejection of crudeness with "political correctness", as the cartoon you provided shows. "Political correctness" has more to do with conformity than non-conformity. Liberals are more likely than conservatives to be non-conformists and act outside social "norms", so they are likely not "politically correct." Totalitarian states have traditionally forced people to toe the line with their behavior. Totalitarian states are usually not based on liberal democratic values. Diversity is not "politically correct", as it inspires acceptance of variety.
